#summary How to (re)build the library and test program

= Build =

<code>make</code> into root directory to compile the two library (libFunction and libParserEffex)

<code>make test</code> into root directory to compile the two library and build a small test program (Parser/Exemple.cpp) 

The Makefile is only available for Windows architecture (for the moment...)

== Windows ==

MinGW can be found at [http://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw/files/]

{Install folder}/bin (containing gcc.exe, make.exe, ...) must be referenced into PATH variable
